@Angibot you're probably right about almost everything imo, he thinks they just disappear but i think he's wrong because the sisters remember the experience and that's why the idol sister got pregnant and slapped him and the long haired sister turned into a hikikomori and started accumulating trash inside her room, she probably got traumatized after he raped her. The story is cool but it doesn't feel like it's finished, or maybe the author didn't want to draw the consequences of his actions with every sister.

My understanding is everyday a girl is randomly selected and take the place of his sister and become part of his family for that day, then they get teleported back when the next swap should happen and probably forget what happend until they come back as his sister (odds should make it impossible but the idol did it)
